channel.name: CBC News CA
channel.title: The National
channel.desc: CBC's flagship nightly news program, featuring the day's top stories with in-depth and original journalism; Adrienne Arsenault and Ian Hanomansing anchor.

channel.title: Live: CBC Morning Live With Heather Hiscox
channel.desc: Live breaking news from Canada and around the world. Heather Hiscox anchors this fast-paced, engaging program covering the stories that matter.

channel.title: Live: Netherlands Liberation: 80 Years

channel.name: CBC News CA
channel.title: Marketplace
channel.desc: Marketplace visits 100 businesses, and counts up where all your tips are going. In some provinces, it's illegal for companies to pocket tips but we reveal it's happening anyway.

channel.name: CBC News CA
channel.title: The Fifth Estate
channel.desc: A judge has ruled that two protesters involved in convoy blockades in Coutts, Alta., were willing "to engage in a war with police.".

channel.title: The Nature of Things
channel.desc: Scientists are racing against time to save the world's coral reefs before they're lost forever.
